maqras.text: Then Lot believed in him and he (Abraham or Lot) said: indeed I am an emigrant to my Master, indeed He is he powerful and the wise
And We gave him Isaac and Jacob and We put the prophethood and the book for his descendants, and We gave him his reward in the world, and in the hereafter he is certainly of the righteous
And (remember) Lot when he said to his people: you certainly commit the indecency that none of humankind did it before you

Do you approach the males and cut off the way and you commit the unacceptable in your gatherings? But there was no answer from his people except to say: bring us God’s punishment if you are of the truthful
He said: my Master, help me against the corrupting people
And when Our messengers brought Abraham the good news, they said: indeed we are destroyers of this town's people, for its people are wrongdoers
He said: indeed Lot is in it. They said: we know better who is in it, we shall save him and his family except his wife who is among those staying behind

And when Our messengers came to Lot, he was upset about them and he felt uneasy about them, and they said: do not be afraid and do not be sad, for we are you and your family’s savior except your wife who is among those staying behind
Indeed We are bringing down a punishment on people of this town from the sky because they were disobeying
And We have certainly left part of it as a clear sign for people who understand
And (We sent) their brother Shu'aib to Midian. Then he said: my people, serve God and expect the last day and do not do mischief on the earth as corruptors
So they denied him, then the earthquake took them, and they became motionless bodies in their houses
And (We destroyed) Aad and Thamud, and it has become clear to you by their houses. Satan beautified their works for them, turning them away from the way even though they were able to see
And (We destroyed) Qarun and Pharaoh and Haman. And Moses has certainly brought them the clear proofs, but they were arrogant on the earth, and they were not overtaking (Our punishment)

We took each one (into punishment) for his sin, We sent some of them a sandstorm, and We took some of them with the awesome roar, and We sank some of them down into the earth, and We drowned some of them. God was not wrong to them, but they were doing wrong to themselves
The example of those who took a protector other than God is like the spider that makes a house for herself, and indeed the weakest house is the spider’s house, if they knew
Indeed God knows anything they call on besides Him, and He is the powerful and the wise
And these are examples, We give them for the people and only the knowledgeable understand them
God created the skies and the earth rightfully. Indeed there is a sign in that for the believers

Read what is revealed to you from the book and perform the mandatory prayer, for the mandatory prayer prevents from the indecency and the wrong (and unacceptable), and God's remembrance is certainly greater, and God knows what you do
